DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate ability EXC 001 improve appearance scar subject undergoing revision scar result prior breast surgery . The study also evaluate safety tolerability EXC 001 placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study EXC 001 Improve Appearance Scars From Prior Breast Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects must previously breast surgery result unacceptable scar Subject choose breast scar revise Subjects must pregnant lactate Currently pregnant pregnant 6 month prior inclusion study , lactate Participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior start study Any condition prior therapy , , opinion PI , would make subject unsuitable study
